More on this in an upcoming post ðŸ˜ƒ

item.title: Stray Puppies
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)

item.title: Summer of Code 2015
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)
item.description: Summer is now slowly fading away, and what a summer it has been here in Sweden! For someone who isn’t a fan of the summer heat it has been an awesome time for brain work, and in my case work on my open source projects! :-) Due to my not really taking much vacation previous years I had saved up for ten weeks (10) this year! It was really worth it, and for the first time in many years I actually feel rested.
